mdRecord.dcterms:title: Middelbvrgvm, Selandiae Opp: sitv, opere, et mercimontiis, Florentiss
Middelburgum, Selandiae Opp: situ, opere et mercimoniis, Florentiss
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hogenberg, Frans, approximately 1539-1590
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 32 x 35 cm. on sheet 40 x 52 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Latin text on verso has caption title "Middelbvrgvm" and Plate no. 28.

An engraving, presumably by Frans Hogenberg, which appeared as Plate 28 in Vol. 2 of an edition of: Civitates Orbis Terrarum van Georg Braun en Frans Hogenberg, a work in 6 parts published in Cologne between 1572 and 1623.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Gift of Eleanor Pearre Abbot in memory of Marshall Lingan Etchison, January 2011.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Middelburg (Netherlands)--Aerial views--Early works to 1800.
Middelburg (Netherlands)--Maps--Early works to 1800.
